body:
Hi Qinheng,



Chris has implemented the bake methods and can provide a better answer. Only [based on the source code](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/src/ladybug_ladybug.py#L2977) ladybug also converts meshes to hatch for the vector export.



Nevertheless, this is a very beautiful visualization!



Mostapha
